title: High-End Apts. Minutes to Philly airport & Boeing  NORTHVIEW BUILDING
description:
www.northviewpa.com
The NORTHVIEW BUILDING Located in scenic, suburban Eddystone, Pa, Northview is a newly renovated apartment building that combines homestyle decor and modern design to create the perfect combination of comfort and style. With balconies overlooking picturesque Ridley Creek, Northview offers a taste of nature’s beauty with all the conveniences of city-life. Close to shopping and transportation and part of the sought - after Ridley School District.
Some features include, Spacious living and bed rooms with plenty of closet and storage. Modern shaker style kitchen cabinets with Granite counter tops, brushed nickel fixtures built - in microwaves and stainless appliances. Vinyl, wood plank flooring and modern high- end finishes. Modernly- styled bathrooms and modern laundry facilities. Card access entry system and security cameras throughout interior and exterior of building.

title: University City -4 bed, 3.5 bath with Roof Deck
description: Four Bedroom, Four Baths, Finished Basement with Full Bathroom, Laundry room, Roof Deck, Big backyard. Victorian details finely maintained. Modern kitchen, wood floors, enclosed front porch. Close to University of Penn, Drexel, University of the Sciences and public transportation. So many restaurants, shops, university services, reasonably priced and ready to move in NOW! Just totally painted with a light grey and white ceilings and so many windows. What's really interesting is the third floor is one big bedroom with en-suite bath featuring two vanities, shower and a whirlpool so this could be the main tenant and then still have three bedrooms left over. Kitchen is big and features granite and stainless. Victorian touches such as beamed ceilings, a working fireplace with classic mantel and surround and inlaid hardwood floors.

title: Studio Apartment Home with City Skyline View, Package Room, Dog Spa
description:
The studio apartment home at 2307 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 23rd floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, nail salons, and more! Go grocery shopping at Trader Joe's and Giant. Dine out at Rouge and Pietro's. Grab a cup of coffee at J'aime French Café, Konditori, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar. Have afternoon tea at The Dandelion, Mary Cassatt Tea Room & Garden, and Sofitel Philadelphia. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Relax with a manicure at Naturale and Coco Blue Spruce. Shop at the weekly farmer's market along the beautiful park at Rittenhouse Square every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
We have an attached parking garage! Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by community, so the monthly cost is separate.
Our community amenities are amazing! We have a package room, dog spa, 8,000-square-foot lounge, top-of-the-line fitness center, fitness/yoga studio, sauna, guest suites, and bicycle storage. The resident lounge features a pool table, media room, printer, conference room, demonstration kitchen, dining area, and cozy seating areas. Plus, we are renovating the roof deck!
There is a laundry room conveniently located on every floor. Plus, quickly do multiple loads of laundry at once in our large laundry facility on the third floor. You use a laundry card. No quarters!
This building is convenient to shopping! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include: Anthropologie, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Lagos, Tumi, J.Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Brooklinen, Vans, CB2, Kitchen Kapers, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack.
Wondering if this home is still available for lease at the Rittenhouse Claridge? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2307 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Gabby or Michelle using ResMate on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term. 2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Feast your eyes on a gorgeous!
description:
Feast your eyes on a gorgeous, fully renovated 1867 Queen Anne Italianate carriage house situated on a quiet, well-maintained block in the heart of Fairmount! This home provides city living at its finest, includes a one car garage with extra storage and two private decks. Enter through a classic foyer with 2 stunning mahogany doors. The open floor plan boasts a well-appointed gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a walk-in pantry, and a large breakfast bar area. Completing the first floor of this home are the dining room, a spacious family room, a powder room, a laundry area, and the garage with original blue slate flooring. The second floor includes a spacious living area with gorgeous hardwood flooring and a wood-burning fireplace for those cozy fall and winter evenings and two well-appointed en-suite bedrooms, including one bathroom with radiant heated floors and waterfall shower head. The third floor features a sun-filled study with an oversized cupola, beautiful in-laid hardwood floors and French doors, which lead to a large deck area, complete with a pergola, gas connected grill and views of the Art Museum fireworks. The beautiful primary suite includes a spacious walk-in closet, an elegant full bath with heated limestone floors, double vanity, and waterfall shower head and French doors that lead to another private roof deck where you can take in the breathtaking city views! Additional highlights of this home include updated mechanicals - new HVAC and a new water heater, custom millwork, a new roof, and high-end finishes throughout while simultaneously maintaining the original charm and unique character of the home. Located on a desirable, tree-lined street in the heart of the Art Museum area, just steps to Fairmount Park and so many great restaurants and The Barnes. There are also so many indoor and outdoor entertainment options close by like Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Boathouse Row, Schuylkill River Trail and so much more. Does this sound like your new home? Schedule your showing today - This charmer will not last long!
1927 Brandywine St

description:

Walk off the busy street into 640 North Broad and enter an urban space that combines the old with the new. Feel the past mix with a refreshing dose of hip, understated sophistication. The original character of the building is not lost but enhanced by modern accents and furnishings. A thriving community dwells within our walls -- a state-of-the-art fitness center, cyber cafe, and yoga studio serve to nurture body, mind, and spirit. Setting the night sky aglow, our glass-domed pool house is the perfect place to unwind. Go for a swim in the warm salt water, relax your muscles in the Jacuzzi, or meet and socialize on the roof deck lounge. Enter the lobby, your public space. title: Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital
description:
Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Easy access to public transportation, South Street, nearby Rittenhouse Square, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Sorry, no pets. No smoking.
759 S 22nd St

title: CENTER CITY PHILADELPHIA APT NEAR RITTENHOUSE SQ BE A PART OF HISTORY
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. description:
The unfurnished studio apartment home at 2510 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 25th floor features large windows that face south and have a Chancellor Street view including a peak of South Philadelphia in between high-rise buildings. We plan to renovate this particular home. Be the first to enjoy new renovations! This renovated kitchen will be nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. There is a front door attendant and a front desk concierge. In this building, there is a laundry room on every floor. Please note that this valet parking garage is not managed by this community, so the monthly parking fee is separate.
Nearby grocery stores and food markets are Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Traders Joe's, Giant, and Di Bruno Bros.

title: East Passion Crossing neighborhood features 3 bedroom and 2 bath
description: Welcome to 1733 S 10th Street. This spacious, recently renovated and well-kept brick rowhome situated in the desirable East Passion Crossing neighborhood features 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. Classic features such as original hardwood floors accompany modern finishes throughout. This meticulously-kept home with updated kitchen and bathrooms present the perfect balance of charm and contemporary design.  Upon entry, you will notice the spacious living room with hexagon-style tile flooring, crown moldings, and a beautiful hardwood staircase with hardwoods throughout the second floor. The first-floor half bath has modern touches, including a floating vanity. You’ll enter the contemporary kitchen past the dining room, which features marble countertops, island seating, a gorgeous marble backsplash, stainless steel appliances, and abundant natural light. The kitchen provides access to the rear patio, a perfect size for entertaining multiple guests at summer BBQs or winding down with family. Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. The expansive master bedroom has built-in closet space and an inter-connecting bedroom door. A full bath with brush nickel fixtures, marble flooring, marble walls, a full-size pedestal sink, and a soaking tub with shower. The spacious basement is partially finished with laundry and an extra toilet. The home is just around the corner from the incredible East Passyunk restaurant scene, numerous coffee shops, and multiple parks. Easy access to I95 and public transportation, including the Broad St line connecting you to center city and the stadiums. Give us your number with the goal that we might call you for extra data.
